MeasureCounter - Windows Installation
======================================

CONTENTS:
- MeasureCounter.vst3 (64-bit VST3 plugin)

INSTALLATION:

1. Extract this archive

2. Copy the plugin to your VST3 folder:
   C:\Program Files\Common Files\VST3\

   Or use the command prompt:
   xcopy /E /I MeasureCounter.vst3 "C:\Program Files\Common Files\VST3\MeasureCounter.vst3"

3. Restart your DAW or rescan plugins

WINDOWS SMARTSCREEN:
Windows may show a SmartScreen warning for unsigned software.
Click "More info" then "Run anyway" to proceed.

SUPPORTED DAWS:
- Ableton Live
- FL Studio
- Reaper
- Cubase
- Studio One
- And any DAW supporting VST3
